cilantro corn and black bean salad

@daralynn13 An easy lunch that holds up to pack for work is black bean and corn salad. Mix black beans, corn, halved cherry tomatoes, cilantro. Toss with lime/olive oil/cumin/honey dressing. Add minced red onion and a pinch of chili powder if you want. Sliced avocado on top.
cilantro corn and black bean salad
@emzanotti Broiled salmon with black bean and corn salad (corn, black beans, garlic, lime juice, hot sauce, diced jalapeno or green chiles, cilantro).  Super easy.
